Authors: Tjiptomongsoguno A.R.W., Chen A., Sanyoto H.M., Irwansyah E., Kanigoro B.
Title: Medical Chatbot Techniques: A Review
Source title: Advances in Intelligent Systems and Computing
Affiliations: School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Tjiptomongsoguno, A.R.W., School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Chen, A., School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Sanyoto, H.M., School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Irwansyah, E., School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Kanigoro, B., School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: In the current world situation, people are more concerned about their health. Unfortunately, nowadays the doctor human resource is lesser than the patient. These circumstances make a lot of people who seek treatment are unhandled. Many studies can solve this problem with some kind of chatbot or health assistant. In this paper, we want to explore and deepen more about chatbots that could help people to get the same and proper treatment as a doctor would do. © 2020, The Editor(s) (if applicable) and The Author(s), under exclusive license to Springer Nature Switzerland AG.
Index Keywords: Intelligent systems; Software engineering; Chatbot; Chatbots; Human resource is; Computational methods
